text:
Michael Wechner:

"I believe the reasons it chrashes from time to time are the C-libraries on our 
Debian machine together with JDK. Well, it's just a guess for the moment, but I 
will try to find out."

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
This particlular problem with the demo seems to have been solved by moving to 
another system.
